name: Spring Boot 2.7.0 Released With Support for GraphQL, Podman and Cache2k
summary:
VMware has released Spring Boot 2.7.0, the latest and final branch of the 2.x series. 
This latest version of Spring Boot includes support for Spring for GraphQL 1.0; support for the Podman container engine; dependency management and auto-configuration for Cache2k; and new test annotations for ElasticSearch and CouchBase.
